QuestData.Title: Ethel Rethor
QuestData.Description: We have plenty of enemies in this region without raising the ire of the Cenarion Circle.$b$bWhen we established our post here, we were asked to keep a watch over one of their researchers.$b$bKorrah was last seen at the tower to the west. Do be a dear and pay her a visit. It's been some time since we've bothered to check on her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Cerelia at Furien's Post wants you to speak to Korrah at Ethel Rethor.
QuestData.RewardText:
It is good that you have come.
There is grave danger looming here.
